resources:
Buenos Aires Guide
Unicenter Unicenter is a major shopping and entertainment complex in Greater Buenos Aires, Argentina. Mon\u0020-\u0020Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002010AM\u0020-\u002010PM Paraná 3745, Martínez, BA
48Q3FFRG+JH
Abasto The building was the central wholesale fruit and vegetable market in the city from 1893 to 1984. Since 1999, it has served as a shopping mall. Mon\u0020-\u0020Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002010AM\u0020-\u002010PM Av. Corrientes 3247, CABA 48Q39HWQ+MM
Recoleta Mall The Recoleta Mall (formerly known as "Village Recoleta") is the newest shopping center in the city of Buenos Aires Mon\u0020-\u0020Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002024 hs Vicente López 2050, CABA 48Q3CJ64+8F
Alcorta Shopping The Paseo Alcorta Shopping is a commercial center that occupies a complete block, within the exclusive neighborhood of "Palermo Chico". Mon\u0020-\u0020Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002010AM\u0020-\u00209PM Jerónimo Salguero 3172, CABA 48Q3CHFW+W7 \ Alto Palermo Alto Palermo is located in one of the most populated neighborhoods of Buenos Aires, and just over four kilometers from downtown. Mon\u0020-\u0020Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002010AM\u0020-\u002010PM Av. Santa Fe 3253, CABA 48Q3CH6Q+MP
Dot Baires The Dot Baires Shopping is a mall located in the neighborhood of Saavedra , Buenos Aires, Argentina inaugurated on May 13 of 2009. Mon\u0020-\u0020Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002010AM\u0020-\u002010PM Vedia 3600, Buenos Aires 48Q3FG36+PP
Galerias Pacifico Galerías Pacífico is a shopping centre in BA, located at the intersection of Florida St. and Córdoba Av. Mon\u0020-\u0020Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002010AM\u0020-\u00209PM Av. Córdoba 550, CABA 48Q3CJ2G+F2
Norcenter Norcenter is the first lifestyle mall of Argentina in Greater Buenos Aires, Argentina. Mon\u0020-\u0020Fri\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002011AM\u0020-\u00209PM Sat\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002010AM\u0020-\u00209PM Sun/Holidays\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002012AM\u0020-\u00209PM Esteban Echeverria 3750, Vicente López, BA 48Q3FFPH+64
Pony Line Creative cocktails, best-in-the-city burgers and artisanal beers are just some of the highlights at our fun and lively lounge. Mon\u0020-\u0020Fri\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002011AM\u0020-\u00202AM Sat\u0020\u0020\u0020\u00206PM\u0020-\u00203AM Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u00205PM\u0020-\u00201AM Posadas 1086, CABA 48Q3CJ58+PW
i Latina I Latina is a latin american cuisine restaurant that offers a 7 course tasting menu, a culinary journey from Mexico to Patagonia. Tue\u0020-\u0020Sat\u0020\u0020\u0020\u00208PM\u0020-\u002011:30PM Pedro Domingo Murillo 725, CABA 48Q39HX4+VC
The Argentine Experience Hands-On Dining in BA. More than just a restaurant, the Argentine Experience is more like an interactive dinner party. Mon\u0020-\u0020Sat\u0020\u0020\u0020\u00206PM\u0020-\u002011PM Fitz Roy 2110, CABA 48Q3CH98+PX
Don Julio Parrilla Popular destination for classic steaks, local dishes & a long wine list in an intimate ambiance. Mon\u0020-\u0020Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002012PM\u0020-\u00204PM,\u00207PM\u0020-\u00201AM Guatemala 4699, CABA 48Q3CH7G+F6
Siga La Vaca With a large room that can accommodate a large number of diners, the Siga La Vaca (all you can eat) restaurant has a variety of grilled meats. Mon\u0020-\u0020Fri\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002012PM\u0020-\u00201AM Sat/Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002012PM\u0020-\u00202:30AM Av. Alicia Moreau de Justo 1714, CABA 48Q39JJM+GQ
Naturaleza Sabia Naturaleza Sabia is a vegetarian restaurant, with vegan and gluten-free options. Naturaleza Sabia is an oasis of well-being in the city. Tue\u0020-\u0020Sat\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002012PM\u0020-\u00203:30PM,\u00208PM\u0020-\u002012AM Balcarce 958, CABA 48Q39JJH+CX
Caminito Colorful and traditional, this walkway in the La Boca area is dominated by tango dancers and artisans. Av. Don Pedro de Mendoza y Magallanes, CABA 48Q39J6Q+9H
Casa Rosada The Casa Rosada is the executive mansion and office of the President of Argentina. The palatial mansion is known officially as Casa de Gobierno. Balcarce 50, CABA 48Q39JRH+PV
Obelisco de Buenos Aires The Obelisco de Buenos Aires is a national historic monument and icon of Buenos Aires. It was erected in 1936 to commemorate the quadricentennial of the first foundation. Av. 9 De Julio & Av. Corrientes, CABA 48Q39JW9+G9
Teatro Colón The Teatro Colón is the main opera house in Buenos Aires. It is considered one of the ten best opera houses in the world by National Geographic. Cerrito 628, CABA 48Q39JX8+HQ
Plaza de Mayo Plaza de Mayo has been the scene of the most momentous events in Argentine history, as well as the largest popular demonstrations in the country. Av. Rivadavia & Av. San Martin, CABA 48Q39JRH+M3
Paseo El Rosedal Scenic park with sprawling rose gardens, plus statues of famous poets & a lake with a quaint bridge. Tue\u0020-\u0020Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u00208AM\u0020-\u00206PM Av. Libertador & Av. Sarmiento, CABA 48Q3CHHM+P3
Parque de los Niños Grassy waterfront park with a promenade, kids’ play structures, shade trees & picnic areas. Tue\u0020-\u0020Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002010AM\u0020-\u00208PM Int. And PAZ, 1428 CABA 48Q3FGCV+G9
Botanical garden The Buenos Aires Botanical Garden is a botanical garden located in the Palermo neighborhood of Buenos Aires in Argentina. Wed\u0020-\u0020Fri\u0020\u0020\u0020\u00208AM\u0020-\u00206:45PM Sat/Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u00209:30AM\u0020-\u00206:45PM Vedia 3600, Buenos Aires 48Q3CH8M+X3
Galileo Galilei planetarium The Galileo Galilei planetarium, commonly known as Planetario, is located in Parque Tres de Febrero in the Palermo district of Buenos Aires, Argentina. Tue\u0020-\u0020Fri\u0020\u0020\u0020\u00209:30AM\u0020-\u00205PM Sat/Sun\u0020\u0020\u0020\u002011:30AM\u0020-\u00207PM Vedia 3600, Buenos Aires 48Q3CHJQ+48
